articles.description: A video of a Florida man picking up a golf ball from an alligator's tail at the Coral Oaks Golf Course in Cape Coral has gone viral on social media. Watch:
articles.content:
Cape Coral: Florida is full of alligators. The US state also has lots of golf sources. Put the two together and you get a Florida golfer facing an alligator. That's dangerous. No doubt about it.
